Components

Concept provides dozens of components that you can plug and play in your website or application. Choose which components to include in the concept.scss file and add classes to your html to use the styles for each component.

Horizontal Rule

Choose from three styles:

<div class="c-v-center"> <hr class="c-hr-full"> <hr class="c-hr-half"> <hr class="c-hr-mini"> </div>

Header

Choose the height of your header with $header-height.

// Defines the height of a default header div $header-height: 70%; <header class="header-background"> <div> <h1>This is a header</h1> <h3>Here is a subtitle.</h3> </div> </header>
